name: Skeleton Ramen
description:
Skeleton Ramen is a runner-styled game set at the ramen cart of an undead chef. He runs his cart for all kinds of mythical creatures.  Play 10 levels of increasing difficulty as you slide ramen down the table while avoiding annoying patrons.

Controller and Keyboard Compatibles!
AD / Left Stick = Move left and right
WS / Left Stick = Speed up and slow down
Space Bar / A Button = Continue to next level
Escape / Start Button  = Pause Menu

Skeleton Ramen was created for the [Insert Game Here]'s 2019 Halloween Game Jam. The theme was Dem Bonez, so I chose a skeleton character, I originally wanted to do Dim Sum but it didn't translate well for the voxel-style. 

Since we were given two weeks I wanted to make my first all 3D game, this game is a monument of a lot of my hard work as it's experimenting with a 3D style I never did before (voxels), it's the first game I programmed by myself and it's my first fully completed game.

I would've liked to fix and update the game, however, the original files are lost with my older hard drive.

Everything by Oakland Elliff
Music by Jaymeson Pon
Menu Art by Emily Miller
